about.heading: Turning ideas into clean, responsive web solutions.
about.intro: Hi! I’m Elham — a creative Full-Stack Developer with 3+ years of experience crafting responsive, user-focused web applications. With a strong foundation in UI/UX design, I specialize in building fast, accessible, and intuitive digital experiences that seamlessly bridge design and functionality — from sleek frontends to robust backends.
about.point1: I believe in writing clean, scalable code, collaborating openly, and continuously improving — whether it’s through code reviews, feedback, or diving into a new tech stack.
about.point2: I’m always open to interesting full-stack projects, design-driven products, or joining a team that values creativity and clean code.
